definition: to grant/to give/to bestow/to act/to carry out
fat/fertile/loose-fitting or large/to fertilize/to become rich by illegal means/fertilizer/manure

sentences.english: The characteristics of phosphorus absorption in soil under the condition of different fertilizations was studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了不同施肥處理的蔬菜保護地土壤磷的吸附特性。

sentences.english: He fed the plant a mixture containing fish and  seaweed.
sentences.chinese: 他用一種含有魚類和海藻的混合物給植物施肥。

sentences.english: Fertilization shows no significant effects on the activities of catalase and sucrase.
sentences.chinese: 施肥對蔗糖酶和過氧化氫酶活性的影響較小。

sentences.english: Growth period every half moon fertilizes 1 times.
In addition, soil fertility was improved along with the increment of fertilization.
sentences.chinese: 施肥後效和土壤肥力均隨施肥量的增加而提高。

sentences.english: In addition, soil fertility was improved along with the increment of fertilization.
sentences.chinese: 施肥後效和土壤肥力均隨施肥量的增加而提高。

sentences.english: The farmer tills the soil, plants, fertilizes, weeds, and waits for the rain.
sentences.chinese: 農夫鬆土，種植，施肥，除草，然後等待天降甘霖。

sentences.english: Andfarmers can use camel west waste to fertilize their crops.
sentences.chinese: 農民能用駱駝的糞便來給農作物施肥。

sentences.english: This paper first gives the design and calculation of mounted fertilizing seeder (2BFD-7) for walking tractor.
sentences.chinese: 重點論述了該施肥播種機的設計與計算。

sentences.english: Promote dry farming and soil testing before fertilizing.
sentences.chinese: 積極發展旱作農業，深入推進測土配方施肥。

sentences.english: Power pesticide dusters can be calibrated and used to apply fertilizer.
sentences.chinese: 動力殺蟲劑可以調整用來施肥。

sentences.english: Difference existed on fertilization of different site conditions.
sentences.chinese: 不同立地條件其施肥效果存在一定的差異。

sentences.english: Averages of four dressing levels in 1982.
An important technique of turf- case in golf course is applying fertilizers.
sentences.chinese: 施肥是高爾夫球場草坪營養護養的一項重要手段。

sentences.english: For mature trees reduce the amount of fertilizer.
sentences.chinese: 對於老樹而言，需要減少施肥量。

sentences.english: This encouraged Burgundians to spread fertilisers to increase production.
sentences.chinese: 這促使勃艮第人不斷的施肥以獲得更高產量。

definition: to sprout/to come out (of seedling)/to bud
